nuget.title: BlazorIDB
nuget.description: Coded in .Net 6, a nuget package for Blazor that utilizes IndexedDb.
nuget.popupdescription: This is a simple wrapper of the idb-keyval.js library for Blazor applications. It is designed to be used similar to Entity Framework Database.

bitcoin.title: Crowdfund
bitcoin.description: Coded in .Net Core,MVC Project Azure SQL database.
bitcoin.popupdescription: A prototype site with MVC pattern in ASP.NET, CRUD operations built in CodeAcademy.

books.title: BulkyBookProject
books.description: Coded in .Net Core, MVC Project with SQL Server Database.
books.popupdescription: A prototype ecommerce site for book sales with MVC architecture and unit of work pattern, API for email notifications, Ajax calls for datatables,built during ASP.NET Specialization course.

camilla.title: ProjectCamilla
camilla.description: Coded in .Net Core with DevExtreme, DevExtreme Library, MVC Project with SQL Server Database.
camilla.popupdescription: This is a project I was placed to in my first job.I was responsible for parts of it's maintenance as well as adding some features. It is an MVC project consisting of the main application, a WEB API app taking care of external calls and a worker app. It is written in .Net Core, JavaScript and jQuery along with DevExtreme library. In this project I gained experience on CI/CD, remote desktop functionalities, Azure DevOps and SQL Server Database.

chip.title: ArduinoProject
chip.description: Arduino IDE, Overwrote a fitness tracker chip.
chip.popupdescription: This was my first introduction to scrum-like schedule in professional ground, the goal of my project was to change the functionality of a Fitness Tracker board using Arduino IDE, changing the source code of a related project in order to validate and replicate it’s behavior, transforming it into an optical density device for liquids.

discord.title: Botcraft
discord.description: Coded in C# and key.NET, used Discord.Net Library
discord.popupdescription: A discord bot written in C# and .NET with APIs for Reddit, Youtube and Oxford Dictionary.

discordjs.title: DiscordBot
discordjs.description: Coded in Javascript, Used Discord.JS Library.
discordjs.popupdescription: This was a discord bot with simple functionalities for discord server administrators written in Javascript and Node.js

footprint.title: Wolftrack
footprint.description: Coded in .Net Core, Web API Project.
footprint.popupdescription: A backend CRUD application with Geolocation API in .NET Core.

gyxilogo.title: Gyxi
gyxilogo.description: Coded in Blazor with MudBlazor, Blazor WebApp with token authentication and WebAPI integration.
gyxilogo.popupdescription: This is a C# .Net 6 Blazor WebAssembly app using MudBlazor and MVU architecture.

house.title: Crowdfund
house.description: Coded in .Net Core and Blazor with SQL Server Database.
house.popupdescription: A .Net Web solution using Blazor Server & WebAssembly with WEB API project and repository pattern, Radzen Blazor library and Stripe Payments

htmlcss.title: ThemingProject
htmlcss.description: HTML and CSS, Static HTML page.
htmlcss.popupdescription: This is a static page project that demonstrates Pixel Perfect UI/UX Design, given a set of images in Figma I had to replicate that in HTML and CSS.

lizzy.title: ProjectLizzy
lizzy.description: Coded in .Net Core with DevExtreme, DevExtreme Library, MVC Project with SQL Server Database.
lizzy.popupdescription: This ia a ticketing system with custom integration for AzDo for tracking and submission of tickets (requests, incidents etc.), creating tickets in the project results in creating the appropriate ticket category in Azure DevOps.

recipe.title: ProjectCooking
recipe.description: Coded in .Net Core and Blazor, Blazor WebAssebly, Web API and POSTGRESQL Database.
recipe.popupdescription: This is a personal project I develop on my free time, at the moment it consists of 2 Libraries(one for the DTOs and one for the Database Entities), a front end application on Blazor WASM and a WEB API project that takes cares of the business logic with repository pattern JWT Authentication and 2FA via email, Custom Google SignIn and email verification as well as ASP.NET Identity, using MudBlazor library.

weddinginv.title: WeddingInvitation
weddinginv.description: Coded in Blazor with MudBlazor, Blazor WebApp with API project and GoogleSheets as Database.
weddinginv.popupdescription: This is a project that is meant to be used for wedding invitations in digital form. It consists of a web app in Blazor WebAssembly, an API in .Net 6 and as a database there is an integration google sheets API.It uses CI/CD through Github Actions and it is hosted in Azure, the API project as App Service and the client web app as Static Web App Service (since it's SPA).

exelia.title: Software Developer
exelia.description: Development and maintenance of a C# .NET Core Web API, with React.js library on front end,Azure SQL Database, WebJobs for scheduled tasks.

arhs.title: Software Developer
arhs.description: Development and maintenance of a C# ASP.NET Core MVC solution, with DevExtreme and jQuery library on front end and Ajax for asynchronous updates of UI, SQL Server as database, Web API Project for external exposure and a worker Console App for scheduled tasks, CI/CD on AzureDevOps and two-way integration of the main app to AzureDevOps for Work Items and Azure Wiki Pages.

freelance.title: Freelance Software Developer
freelance.description: •Developed a discord chatting bot with C# and Discord.Net for internal usage at a gaming discord server and completed minor tasks requested by the server community. •Programmed simulations and data visualizations to represent microclimate changes for urban design and prove that the outcome would be beneficial for sustainability. •Developed a client side C# .Net 6 Blazor WebAssembly app using MudBlazor and MVU architecture hosted in Azure and communicates through HTTP with a webAPI application, has authentication with JWT and 2FA via email, Google SSO and finally uses Postgresql as a database.

transition.title: Career Transition
transition.description: Started studying programming and completed various courses on Coursera.

programmer.title: Programmer Internship
programmer.description: Took place in Lars Angenent Lab and consisted of modification and programming on a fitness tracker in order to change it's functionality.

thesis.title: Master's Thesis
thesis.description: Research on biodegradation of weathered polypropylene microplastics in marine microsystem environment.

internship.title: Engineer Internship
internship.description: Completed my internship as an Engineer in Maritime Museum of Crete researching on degradation in coastal areas.

energy.title: Energy evaluation of buildings
energy.description: Developed simulations to evaluate the energy consumption and requirements of buildings based on different materials.

army.title: Army Services
army.description: Completed my compulsary Army Duties as a paratrooper.

izmir.title: Exchange Program
izmir.description: Took part in Erasmus + Student Exchange Program in Ege University of Izmir.

university.title: Enrolled in University
university.description: MSc in Chemical and Environmental Engineering, 5 year's study curriculum.
